name: BASICK RECORDS - iPhone 5 Case
description: BY PUBLIC DEMAND! TheseBASICK RECORDS iPhone 5 cases have finally arrived. Give your iPhone a shiny new look with these strictly limited cases. *fits iPhone 5 and iPhone 5s models only

name: MISERY SIGNALS - 'Absent Light' Ltd Edition Gold/White Vinyl
description: BSK051LP: Misery Signals – ‘Absent Light’ Released: 22nd July 2013 After 5 years of waiting, MISERY SIGNLAS return with the stunning 4th album 'Absent Light', available now in VERY LIMITED numbers on Gold or White Vinyl. Track Listing: 1. A Glimmer of Hope 2. Luminary 3. Reborn (An Execution) 4. Carrier 5. Shadows and Depth 6. Lost Relics 7. Two Solitudes 8. Departure 9. The Shallows 10. Ursa Minor 11. Everything Will Rust This release is also available to download digitally:

name: THE ALGORITHM - 'Polymorphic Code' Ltd Edition Double Vinyl
description:
BSK044LP: THE ALGORITHM – ‘Polymorphic Code’ Released: 20th April 2013 The Algorithm's mesmerising debut album now on Ltd Edition Double Vinyl, produced especially for Record Store Day 2013. Limited to only 500x copies worldwide. PART 4 of 4 SIDE ONE 1. Handshake 2. Bouncing Dot SIDE TWO 3. Trojans 4. Access Granted SIDE THREE 5. Logic Bomb 6. Warp Gate Exploit SIDE FOUR 7. Null 8. Panic This release is also available to download digitally:
Amazon MP3
Bandcamp

name: DEVIL SOLD HIS SOUL - 'Time' - Ltd Edition Wood&Cloud Screen Print
description: TIME is the first single featuring Wood & Cloud's very own Paul Green This stunning artwork is available to pre-order in beautiful Giclee print, sized to compliment the artwork for the bands last release EMPIRE OF LIGHT. Artwork: Time Band: Devil Sold His Soul Ink: Giclee Art Print Paper: Giclee art paper Dimensions (Aprox): (H 452mm x W 430mm) Editions: 75

name: DEVIL SOLD HIS SOUL - 'A Fragile Hope' - Ltd Edition Wood&Cloud Screen Print
description: Artwork: A Fragile Hope Band: Devil Sold His Soul Artist: Paul Jackson Ink: CMYK Lithograph Paper: 300GSM Art Stock Dimensions: (W 594mm x H 420mm) Editions: 100 Devil Sold His Soul have continued to push the musical boundaries with their unique blend of melody and mayhem. This, their debut album, is a bold and memorable release musically and artistically. The artwork created by the extremely talented Paul Jackson is truly electric! WAC04

name: DEVIL SOLD HIS SOUL - 'Empire Of Light' - Ltd Edition Wood&Cloud Screen Print
description: Artwork: Empire of Light Band: Devil Sold His Soul Artist: Paul Jackson Ink: Giclee Art Print Paper: Giclee art paper Dimensions: (W 430mm x H 430mm) Editions: 100 Devil Sold His Soul's album artwork for their 3rd offering Empire of Light. Painted by Wood & Cloud favourite Paul Jackson, this epic seascape is taken from album cover to beautiful print via Giclee printing, high quality throughout to give this piece what it deserves. Embossed, numbered and hand rolled in acid free tissue paper then sealed in a super strong tube!

name: THE ARUSHA ACCORD - 'The Echo Verses' - Ltd Edition Wood&Cloud Screen Print
description: Artwork: The Echo Verses (special edition album) Band: The Arusha Accord Artist: Tom Gilmour Ink: Silver Hand Screen printed Paper: Colorplan 275GSM Black Dimensions: (W 594mm x H 332mm) Editions: 80 The killer artwork for The Arusha Accord's special edition re-release of The Echo Verses album. Designed by our very own Tom Gilmour, this piece is available in 2 limited edition colour ways using screen printed metallic inks on high grade black paper. Hand embossed, rolled and sealed. WAC01

name: UNEVEN STRUCTURE - Ltd Edition Photocard Set
description: Uneven Structure limited edition photocard set. The set contains ten individual photocards, each with a high resolution capture from one of the band's visually magnificent videos. Originally released only with pre-orders, this is you last chance to grab what is a must have collectors item.

name: BASICK RECORDS - Ltd Edition Zip Hoodie
description:
Finally, after much demand, the next in the series of dope BASICK RECORDS zip hoodies are here! Available in GREY | BLACK w/ 'B' breast print and 'BASICK' back print. Check out these sweet product features:
  • Covered main zip with self fabric
  • Twin needle stitching detailing
  • Double fabric hood
  • Right hand pocket w/ hidden opening for earphone cord
  • Hidden earphone loops
  • Ribbed cuffs and hem
  • Self coloured twill tape zip puller
For a size guide in inches, please click HERE *LIMITED STOCKS ONLY* *this graphic is a representation impression - full photos to follow*

description:

Antikythera Mechanism The brainchild of talented producer Rémi Gallego, THE ALGORITHM infuses modern metal breakdowns with a menagerie of electronic subgenres such as IDM, chiptune and breakcore to concoct his own potent style of fiercely heavy music.

name: NO MADE SENSE - 'The Epillanic Choragi' Digipak CD
description:
BSK019CD: NO MADE SENSE – ‘The Epillanic Choragi’ 1. Wake Of Syr 2. The Epillanic Choragi 3. Entases Of Azure 4. Seeking Beyond 5. Milachis Depth 6. Aciculaccolith 7. Elico Moieties 8. Porphyrachis 9. Epinolitholatyr 10. Wake Of Syr (II) "A colossal mind-fuck of a debut album, encapsulating everything that is great about modern metal. Glorious!" - 9/10 - ROCK SOUND "this is an intricately unfolding yet still crushingly heavy odyssey that feels as thought it's casting off its influences and uncovering new, epic terrain in the process. Exhilirating!" - 8/10 - METAL HAMMER
This release is also available to download digitally: iTUNES AMAZON MP3 Bandcamp (FLAC, 320kbps etc)

name: BETWEEN THE SCREAMS - 'Our Last Days On Earth' CD
description:
BSK023CD: BETWEEN THE SCREAMS – ‘Our Last Days On Earth’ 1) LHC 2) The Manhattan Project 3) Our Last Days On Earth 4) Blood Red Dawn 5) * 6) Catacombs 7) The Eagles Are Coming 8) Hemispheres 9) Monument 10) Refuge 11) Light Breaks The Sky “Between The Screams create huge epic and sweeping metallic hardcore statements. So much of what you crave is right here…” – METAL HAMMER
This release is also available to download digitally from: iTunes Amazon MP3

name: MY MINDS WEAPON - 'The Carrion Sky' CD
description:
BSK013CD: MY MINDS WEAPON – ‘The Carrion Sky’ 1) The Karman Line 2) Silhouettes Of Enemies 3) At Least You’re Not Dead 4) Alpha Centauri 5) Six-O-Two 6) Ex-Inferis 7) The Killing Horizon 8) A Sense Of Wonder 9) Lucky Like Kokura 10) Goodbyes *Lucky Like Kokura - Bonus Video The awesome debut album produced by Dan Weller and Justin Hill (SIKTH), featuring guest vocals by Justin Hill himself as well as the bonus promo video for 'Lucky Like Kokura "Production is tight, and the breaks are tasty" - ROCK SOUND "The production is nothing short of brilliant, with a mix that is crystal clear. Ben Timpson's crushing vocals dsiplay a violent intensity and a whopping great presence... I think we'll be hearing a lot about these guys soon" - SUBBA CULTCHA
This album is also available to download from: iTunes

name: NO MADE SENSE - 'nomadesense' Digital EP
description: BSK010CD: NO MADE SENSE – ‘nomadesense’ Highly anticipated 17 minute long, 2 track EP produced by Dan Weller & Justin Hill (SIKTH). 1) Project Keymer 2) Distance Also features some stunning illustration from Dan Mumford (GALLOWS/ARCHITECTS). This CD is now SOLD OUT but is still available to download digitally: iTunes

name: BURY TOMORROW - 'Portraits' CD
description: BSK022CD: BURY TOMORROW – ‘Portraits’ 1. Confessions 2. Evolution of Self 3. You & I 4. Her Bones In The Sand 5. Repair The Lining 6. Casting Shapes 7. Factory Of Embers 8. Relief 9. Anything With Teeth 10. These Woods Aren't Safe For Us 11. Portraits “Bury Tomorrow batter the crowd into shape not just with music but also their wide eyed enthusiasm for all things metal. Whether challenging individual members of the crowd to mosh or starting pits themselves, winning new fans proves very easy.” – KERRANG! LIVE

name: BURY TOMORROW - Ltd Edition 'Portraits' Poster
description:
LTD EDITION A3 'Portraits' posters!

Perfect A3 print size - 420x297 mm (16.5x11.7 in)
Limited to 75x prints only. 
Rolled, packed and shipped worldwide in cardboard tubes!

name: EVITA - 'Minutes & Miles' CD
description: BSK020CD: EVITA – ‘Minutes & Miles’ 1. Cracks In The Walls 2. Thrown To The Wolves 3. Myself To You 4. Absent 5. Willing To Wake 6. Vona 7. When Losing Everything Means Nothing 8. Elusive Victories, Passive Trickeries 9. Beneath My Feet 10. Even The Odds "Metalcore Heavyweights BEWARE - you are about to be challenged!" - ROCK SOUND "Oh yes, we like this a lot. Prolapse inducing riffs and soaring sing-along choruses." - METAL HAMMER This release is also available to download digitally from: iTUNES Amazon MP3

name: EVITA - Ltd Edition 'Minutes & Miles' Poster
description:
LTD EDITION A3 'Minutes & Miles' posters!

Perfect A3 print size - 420x297 mm (16.5x11.7 in)
Limited to 75x prints only. 
Rolled, packed and shipped worldwide in cardboard tubes!

name: GEHENNA VII VII VII - 'Guardians' CD EP
description: BSK017CD: GEHENNA VII VII VII – ‘Guardians’ EP CD released 24th November 2008 1. The Rose 2. Guardians 3. Your Kingdom Will Fall 4. Seven 5. Direction "A ferocious beat-down assault performed with a raw energy that's rare in a band so young." KERRANG!

name: THE COMANCHE CIPHER - 'Ludovico Technique' CD
description: BSK012CD: THE COMANCHE CIPHER – ‘Ludovico Technique’ EP 1. Nervous Smiles & Secret Conversations 2. Swimming With Sharks 3. Fall Of The Beloved 4. Todays Fashions Are Tomorrows Tragedies 5. Red Dress Programme “They seamlessly glide through genre restrictions sounding like early Dillinger Escape Plan then Fugazi then Hatebreed.” – METAL HAMMER “One of the best British bands in their field without a doubt. Superb stuff!” – DSD This release is also available digitally: iTUNES

name: THE ABNER - 'Chinoiserie Lounge' CD EP
description: BSK005CD: THE ABNER – ‘Chinoiserie Lounge’ EP CD released 2nd July 2006 1. Attention Please... 4 Minutes Until Bombtime 2. A Day For Light Refreshments 3. Our Resident Harpist Will Entertain You 4. The Penitent Man Will Pass 5. Enjoy The Hum Of Activity In The Hotel Lobby 6. The Curious Tale Of Jack Lemon This release is also available to download digitally: iTunes Amazon MP3 Play.com
